Recommendations: To maximize the participation of faculty and students in research, it is suggested that they should be involved in the formulation of research agenda of the college.
Encourage all faculty members to be involved in research, either individual or team research to develop their passion and culture for research.
Faculty members may be encouraged to conduct action researches to improve the content and the delivery of the teaching-learning process.
Research capability enhancement for faculty and students may be conducted to update them on the current trends in research which includes the use of statistical software in the analysis of data.
If there is an opportunity, encourage all faculty members to present their research outputs on regional, national and international fora or conferences.
It is suggested that research outputs may be utilized in instruction and extension activities of the college.
